details.title: Innovation and Evolution: Reflections on a life in science: From the Esaki tunnel diode to semiconductor superlattices and quantum wells
details.abstract: Democritus, the great Greek philos opher and speculative s cientis t, said, Everything existingin the Universe is the fruit of chance and of necessity. It is interesting to examine the effect of chance, since it can often play an important role in the process of discovery or invention.
